File.Error.Title: Loading Error
File.Error.Msg0: Oops, we have run into an error! Please follow the procedure below and report to us.
File.Error.Msg1: 1. Screenshot or copy this error message.
File.Error.Msg2: 2. Select "Save As JSON" to retrieve the configuration file.
File.Error.Msg3: 3. Contact us via GitHub Issues or social media.
File.Error.Msg4: Please keep you JSON configuration as you may use it to restore your work after we fix the error. To start a new canvas, select "New Canvas".

Info.Notice: Notice: Due to copyright, licensing and other legal restrictions, Rail Map Generator uses Noto Serif CJK and Vegur instead of MTRSung and Myriad Pro respectively for MTR-style maps. If you have obtained the license of either font, please feel free to edit the relevant code chunk of the exported SVG file.
